links.*: The Battles of the Fords of Isen

wikitext.*:
'''Lord of Isengard''' was the title born by the master of [[Isengard]], a [[Gondorian]] chieftain in command of the local garrison. The guardians with time became secretive and mingled with the [[Dunlendings]] until the Gondorian line failed.<ref name="UTIsen">{{UT|Isen}}, Appendix (ii)</ref> 

[[Saruman]] later declared himself as Lord of Isengard, when he was granted to settle in [[Orthanc]].<ref name="AppMark">{{App|Mark}}</ref> Following the death [[Steward]] [[Turgon (Steward of Gondor)|Turgon]], the [[Istari|Wizard]] no longer paid heed to [[Gondor]] and made Isengard into his fortress,<ref name="AppStewards">{{App|Stewards}}</ref> eventually abandoning his mission to fall into mimicry of the [[Sauron|Enemy]] as his duplicitous vassal, weaving plots to suit his own personal ambitions.<ref name="FRCouncil">{{FR|Council}}</ref>
